# PAD::GET_CONTROL_VALUE

## Summary
Return controller value related to an action (range 0 to 255)

## Parameters
* **CONTROL_TYPE** control
* **CONTROL_ACTION** action

## Returns
* **INT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
control: see IS_CONTROL_ENABLED
